titleStmt.title: Extraordinary newes from Colonell Iohn Barkeer [sic] governour of Coventry, to a merchant of London Shewing how Sir VVilliam Brereton hath raised the siege from Namptwich in Cheshire.
titleStmt.author: Barker, John, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.G. for John Rothwell,

notesStmt.note: The same item as Wing (2nd ed.) E3932.
